for the custom label...in the WPF version, just use marker.Label.SetResource("resourceKeyName") where the resourceKeyName is a label style in a resource dictionary of the WPF project.
If you also change the GMapMarker base class so the popup.allowstransparency = true you'll find it looks better and you can have semi transparent labels.
